summary: This bill, the Water Intelligence, Security, and Cyber Threat Protection Act, aims to enhance the preparedness and resilience of drinking water and wastewater systems against threats. It mandates the EPA to establish a program promoting participation in the Water Information Sharing and Analysis Center (Water ISAC), supporting membership costs, improving EPA-Water ISAC cooperation, and enhancing Water ISAC resources. The bill authorizes $10 million in appropriations for fiscal years 2026 and 2027.
